TrackedLink.title: Tracked Link
TrackedLink.description: Represents a URL that is being tracked for clicks.

name.description: A user-defined name for the link.

clicks.description: The number of times the link has been clicked.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the link was created.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the link.

/users/{userId}/trackedLinks/{linkId}.description: Stores the links that are being tracked by a user.
